alert.note: Alert for Darke; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 7:27PM EDT until July 17 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN PREBLE...SOUTHWESTERN DARKE AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 726 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Madison, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Eaton, Lewisburg, New Paris, West Alexandria, New Madison, Clayton, Brookville, Wayne Lakes, Phillipsburg, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester, Hollansburg, Gordon, Palestine, Ithaca, Castine, Oklahoma, Wheatville and Interstate 70 at US Route 127. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 2 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
